typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	bkey as string,
	hubname as string,
	satname as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DVSource
source(output(
		PersonVID as string,
		BusinessEntityID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBPerson
source(output(
		PersonVID as string,
		LoadDateTime as timestamp,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		EmailPromotion as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		PersonTypeCode as string,
		AdditionalContactInfo as string,
		Demographics as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATPerson
DVSource derive(PersonVID = sha1(toString(byName($bkey)) ),
		Load_TS = currentTimestamp()) ~> hashColumns
hashColumns, SATPerson exists(hashColumns@PersonVID == SATPerson@PersonVID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckNewSatPerson
CheckNewSatPerson alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> NewHubRecords
NewHubRecords select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID,
		PersonType,
		NameStyle,
		Title,
		FirstName,
		MiddleName,
		LastName,
		Suffix,
		EmailPromotion,
		AdditionalContactInfo,
		Demographics,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		PersonVID,
		LoadDateTime = Load_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewSatPerson
hashColumns, HUBPerson exists(hashColumns@PersonVID == HUBPerson@PersonVID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckNewPerson
CheckNewPerson select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID,
		PersonVID,
		LoadDateTime = Load_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewHubPerson
NewSatPerson sink(input(
		PersonVID as string,
		LoadDateTime as timestamp,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		EmailPromotion as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		PersonTypeCode as string,
		AdditionalContactInfo as string,
		Demographics as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PersonVID,
		LoadDateTime,
		NameStyle,
		EmailPromotion,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		PersonTypeCode = PersonType,
		AdditionalContactInfo,
		Demographics,
		MiddleName,
		PasswordHash = PersonVID,
		PasswordSalt = PersonVID,
		Suffix,
		Title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkSatPerson
NewHubPerson sink(input(
		PersonVID as string,
		BusinessEntityID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PersonVID,
		BusinessEntityID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkHubPerson
